thread.title: Travis Kelce Loses His Cool And Shoves Steelers CB Ross Cockrell, Gets Chewed Out By Teammate Justin Houston On The Sidelines
thread.title_full: Travis Kelce Loses His Cool And Shoves Steelers CB Ross Cockrell, Gets Chewed Out By Teammate Justin Houston On The Sidelines

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Travis Kelce Loses His Cool And Shoves Steelers CB Ross Cockrell, Gets Chewed Out By Teammate Justin Houston On The Sidelines
text:
After dropping a pass, a frustrated Travis Kelce lost his cool a few plays later by shoving Ross Cockrell of the Steelers, picking up an unnecessary roughness penalty.
His teammate, Justin Houston was not happy with him on the sidelines.
